name: DGDecNV
description: DGDecNV is a decoder/frameserver for AVC, HEVC, MPEG2, and VC1 streams that runs on the GPU of Nvidia graphics cards that support CUDA video decoding.

functions.name: DGSource
functions.description: DGSource() is a source filter that delivers decoded video in YV12/i420/YUV420P16 format.

functions.name: DGDenoise
functions.description: DGDenoise() is a fast stand-alone CUDA filter that implements NLM denoising.

functions.name: DGSharpen
functions.description: DGSharpen() is a fast stand-alone CUDA filter that implements limited sharpening like the well-known filter LimitedSharpenFaster().

functions.name: DGTelecide
functions.description: DGTelecide() is a fast stand-alone CUDA filter that implements field matching and adaptive deinterlacing.

functions.name: DGDecimate
functions.description: DGDecimate() is a fast stand-alone CUDA filter that implements N-in-M frame decimation. The input clip must be in the YV12 format.

functions.name: DGBob
functions.description: DGBob() is a fast stand-alone CUDA filter that implements the YADIF deinterlacing algorithm (original concept by Michael Niedermayer).

functions.name: PVBob
functions.description: PVBob() is a stand-alone version of the PureVideo deinterlacer. This is the same functionality that you get using the deinterlace parameter of DGSource().
